name: Taking Flight
description: Learn the basics of trading, navigation, and survival in the galaxy.

steps.name: Travel to any adjacent sector
steps.description: Use the warp drive to move to a neighboring sector.

pages: <emotion value="excitable">Welcome to the galaxy, pilot![laughter] I'm Amy, <emotion value="content" />a representative from the Federation, and I'll be guiding you through your first steps as a spacefaring trader.
<emotion value="neutral" /> In this tutorial, we'll cover the basics of navigation, trading, and survival in the galaxy. Don't worry, it's easier than it sounds! Let's get started.

<emotion value="anticipation">Your first task is to travel to an adjacent sector.</emotion> Use your ship's warp drive to move to a neighboring location. This will allow you to explore new areas and find opportunities for trading and adventure. Good luck!

steps.name: Locate the Megaport
steps.description: Find a sector that contains a Megaport.

pages: Great job on your first warp! Now, let's find the Megaport. The Megaport is a major hub for trade and commerce in the galaxy, and it's a great place to start your trading career. Keep warping to adjacent sectors until you find one that contains a Megaport. Once you arrive, you'll have access to markets, shipyards, and other facilities that will help you on your journey.

steps.name: Refuel your ship
steps.description: Purchase warp fuel to recharge your drives.

pages: Now that you've found the Megaport, it's time to refuel your ship. Purchase warp fuel to recharge your drives and continue your journey through the galaxy.

steps.name: Purchase a commodity
steps.description: Buy goods from a port to begin trading.

steps.name: Earn 2000 credits trading
steps.description: Generate at least 2000 credits in trading profit.

steps.name: Deposit 1000 credits into the megabank
steps.description: Transfer at least 1000 credits to the Megaport bank.

steps.name: Purchase a kestrel
steps.description: Buy a Kestrel Courier from a shipyard.
